name: Jgsw
description:
Jigsaw puzzles - the time-tested solution to an excess of free time. Jgsw is a game where you build jigsaw puzzles, either on your own or online with friends. Choose from a variety of included artworks, or even upload your own! Jgsw's simple controls and interface will let you jump into the challenge right away.

Features

  • Play solo or online with friends
  • Customizable artwork is as simple as pasting a link
  • Huge puzzles with 5000+ pieces for those seeking a challenge
  • Unique and varied edge shapes keep the puzzles from getting stale
  • Convenient sorting piles let you quickly organize pieces by color or shape or however you like
  • 3D puzzle pieces for a more immersive feel
